name: Dumb Dungeons
description:
Have you ever played a great RPG, and while exploring its dungeons, think "I just wish these were stupider and smaller"? If so, you're in luck.

  • Explore 10 dungeons randomly selected, pocket-sized dungeons
  • Unlock multiple costumes with different abilities
  • Platform, fight and go through walls in order to complete challenges

Controls:

W to jump

A and D to move

UPDATE:

Final level fixed and it now has an actual boss fight

Added a main menu, game over and victory screens
